structured.description: A deep learning model called DepthAnythingV2 for metric depth estimation and trains it on a dataset using the AdamW optimizer. The code then evaluates the model's performance at various points during training and saves the best-performing model to a checkpoint file.

items.description: Sets up a deep learning model for depth estimation using a variant of the VIT framework. It trains the model on a dataset, evaluates its performance at various epochs, and saves the best model so far to disk.
items.name: main
